a.title: District Continues Meal Provision For Students During Closure

div.a: District Continues Meal Provision For Students During Closure

nav.div: Robertson County Schools » News » Current News » District Continues Meal Provision For Students During Closure

div.h2: District Continues Meal Provision For Students During Closure

div.div: District Continues Meal Provision For Students During Closure

img.p: Day three of meals provided by the Robertson County Schools Nutrition Department showed another increase in deliveries as more families take advantage of breakfasts and lunches offered to county students.

Today, Wednesday, March 25, saw 2,092 meals provided and delivered. School administrators, staff, Robertson County Sheriff’s Office School Resource Officers, and community volunteers make ensure each day that all locations are populated in order to provide this needed service. Locations for meal pickups are posted on the RCS website and meal deliveries are planned to continue until school resumes in April.

ul.li: 800 M. S. Couts Blvd, Suite 2, Springfield, TN 37172
